usage.cn: 成功的秘诀就是四个简单的字：多一点点。 （凡事比别人多一点点！多一点努力，多一点自律，多一点实践，多一点疯狂。多一点点就能创造奇迹！）
usage.eng: Four short words sum up what has lifted most successful individuals above the crowd: a little bit more.

usage.cn: 假如有一天我们湮没在人潮中，庸碌一生，那是因为我们没有努力活的丰盛。
usage.eng: If one day we lost in the crowd, commonplaces life, it is because we have no efforts to live abundantly.

usage.cn: 原来爱情的世界很大，大到可以装下上百种委屈；原来爱情的世界很小，小到三个人就挤到窒息。
usage.eng: The love world is big, which can hold hundreds of disappointments; the love world is small which is crowded even with three people inside.

usage.cn: 缘分不是人海中两个人的擦身，缘分是不可能的相遇。比如我是空中的鸟，你是林中的豹，只是我们碰巧相爱。
usage.eng: Love is not about running into each other in crowds. Love is an impossible meeting. For example, I am a bird flying in sky, you are a leopard in forest. We just fall in love accidentally.
